name: Darkness/Trap B
text:
Activate only by the effect of "Darkness/Trap A". Your opponent cannot activate Spells/Traps in response to this card's activation. If you control "Darkness/Trap A", apply the following effect.
● Activate the first effect of all Set "Darkness/Trap C", "Darkness/Trap D" and "Darkness/Trap E" in your Spell & Trap Zones in any order.

-I activate "Infinity"!-
